mapper.select: select * from app_category where parentId is NULL
select * from data_dictionary where typeName='所属平台'

select id,softwareName,apkName,supportROM,interfaceLanguage,softwareSize,downloads, (select valueName from data_dictionary d where a.flatformId=d.valueId and d.typeName='所属平台') as flatformName ,(select valueName from data_dictionary b where a.status=b.valueId and b.typeName='APP状态') as statusName,(select categoryName from app_category c where a.categoryLevel1=c.id) as categoryLevel1Name, (select categoryName from app_category c where a.categoryLevel2=c.id) as categoryLevel2Name,versionid, (select categoryName from app_category c where a.categoryLevel3=c.id) as categoryLevel3Name, (select versionNo from app_version v where a.versionId=v.id) as versionNo,appInfo,logoPicPath from app_info a where a.`status`=1 and versionid=#{versionid}
mapper.update: UPDATE app_info set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
